PARAGRAPH.STRING: (Nevado Salcantay) or Salkantay (Nevado Salkantay) is the highest peak of the Cordillera Vilcabamba, part of the Peruvian Andes.
is located in the Cusco Region, about 60 km west-northwest of the city of Cusco.
is the 38th highest peak in the Andes, and the twelfth highest in Peru. However, as a range highpoint in deeply incised terrain,
is the second most topographically prominent peak in the country, after Huascar√°n.
